REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2582 reute r f BC-RED-LION-INNS-L.P.-BE 04-07 0048

TEXT.TITLE: RED LION INNS L.P. BEGINS OFFERING
TEXT.BODY:
Red Lion Inns L.P. said it began an initial public offering of 4.9 mln units priced at 20 dlrs a unit. Proceeds and a 105.87 mln dlrs mortgage loan will be used to finance the acquisition of 10 Red Lion hotels, it said.
Reuter
